name: cooking-time-w-esn
description: even"do you want to discover the secrets of the most renowned cuisine of the world? this is the perfect event for you! well meet on zoom in order to cook a delicious dish from abruzzo, a region of central italy. its called "pallotte cacio e ova", a kind of super tasty meatballs but vegetarian! dont worry, well guide you throughout the entire preparation of the dish! and, of course, well eat all together once the dinner will be ready.
